modName: Challenge of the Daedra - Waking Nightmare II
summary: Fight through an epic dungeon with loads of new stuff to fight and collect.  Based on the daedric realm of Quagmire with a familiar boss.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/13960-1-1333035146.png[/img][/center]
by Ironman5000

IMPORTANT! The new version has a esm and esp file, make sure you check both in the data files.

CHANGELOG: 30/03/2012 - Fixed missing creature meshes

                   31/03/2012 - Fixed key issue in tower, unwanted data that might be causing ctds, hag head no longer activates quest.  Added another cell accessed through halls of contempt, plus a few other bits here and there.

                   02/04/2012 - Fixes more missing textures, added more content including Gomlins bloodied armour, compressed the files to BSA (thanks again dogtown1!), And added an extensive walkthrough with map for dwemer abyss trap locations as an optional file to download.

                   03/04/2012 - Added a Walkthrough book and map for dwemer abyss trap tarfet locations in the shack as you enter, plus I made a few more additions uncluding a playable version of Gomlins bloody armour.

                   05/04/2012 - Fixed the decaying walker missing bone textures

                   06/04/2012 - Fixes navmesh errors, adds a few monsters
                   01/06/2012 - Removed the Wisp race as playable, causing CTDs

MAY REQUIRE SKSE TO WORK, GET IT HERE http://skse.silverlock.org/.  Even if doesn\'t it\'s well worth using for other mods

IF YOU GET CTDS TRY DOWNLOADING WITH NMM TO SORT COMPATIBILITY

BE SURE TO GET THE LATEST UPDATES FROM STEAM FOR THIS TO WORK PROPERLY

Description
-------------
This mod is part is part of a series I plan to create that will aim to increase the presence of daedra and daedric princes of Oblivion.
Waking Nightmare 2 introduces a \'point of no return\' dungeon that will add new monsters to fight, new weapons and attire and I have even hidden new spells that allow you to summon these new nightmare creatures to fight alonside you, plus you get a nice prize at the end including a unique daedric artifact!
The \'dungeon\' is based on Vaermina\'s daedric realm of Quagmire - the realm of dreams and nightmares.  The idea of this daedric realm is to torment the player with visions of horror and surrealism, shifting from one place to the next.

Be warned that the realm of Quagmire is not to be underestimated so SAVE REGULARLY (and before you enter just in case), I also recommend waiting until you are about level 20 at least.

!SPOILER ALERT! - If you complete the dungeon and forget to pick up Vaermina orb you will miss the grand prize!  You will also need to pick up a key for the reward chest, it\'s in the bag on a chain at the shrine where you encounter Vaermina.  To get the orb when you have missed it do this,
Open the console type \"help orb 0\" without quotes, press pageup until you find the vaerminas orb and then type \"player.additem (code) 1\".
It will be just like you picked it up and nobody will know the difference ;D


Location
----------
A new map marker has appeared south of Clearspring Tarn and north-west of Boulderfall Cave, roughly half way between Winterhold and Riften on a hill.  See screenshot.
Once you enter the shack have a good look around.


Credits
--------
Dogtown1 for helping me out with the monsters and allowing me to use assets from Skyrin Monster Mod.  If you haven\'t got it already go get it here http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9694
Urwy for URW weapon resources.  Get it here http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12087
Orcadude for Bigger Badder Werewolves.  Get it here http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9400
Werne for his weapons resources
ArmoredThirteen for his Daedric Crescent resource.  Get it here http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4025
Gizmodian for Gizmodian\'s Oblivion Bladepack for Skyrim. Get it here http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13665
Cataxu for splitting the mod to esm and esp to get rid of CTDs, big thanks for that ;D
DeathGR for help with the werewolf summoning script fix


Installation
-------------
Place the esm, esp, bsa, and script folder in the Skyrim\\data folder. 


Uninstallation
----------------
Simply remove the 3 CoD files


Compatibility
----------------
There should be no compatibility issues at all unless one of your mods places something where the starting shack is.


Tools used:

Syrim creation Kit
Nifskope 1.1.0-RC5
Gimp 2.6
author: Ironman5000
